column4: I set up a dhcp server on my ubuntu machine. Clients connect to it and get a dhcp address. However, those clients can't connect the network, it's "unreachable." Why? Clients can't ping the dhcp server
have you set the default gateway up in the dhcpd config?
same subnet on all machines?
same subnet. How do I configure a default gateway?
how do I set up a default gateway?
option routers 192.168.129.10;   in your dhcpd.conf
on the dhcp server

still network unreachable on the clients
